title: Are we not allowed to ask simple questions on posts?
body:
Got this message this morning

https://i.imgur.com/bC69H3t.png

While I understand the comment isn't related to the post, I hardly think this is trolling/spamming. I'm asking someone where they got their player icon (it looked cool). I could understand if I was mocking the person or making a random statement like "Yeah I like chocolate too", but this is a legit question about something featured on the boards.

replies.body: I won't have time for a few hours, but I'll take a look when I can. Unless there's something I'm missing, this should be a fine exception as it's a fairly minor derail on a valid board-related question.

The icon is called Pride's Greatblade, was exlusive to the limited edition 'God-King Superbundle' in the 2018 Lion Vs. Wolf event.
Source: https://leagueoflegends.fandom.com/wiki/Summoner_icon

Nope. We're people, and that means sometimes we slip up a bit. In this case our policy *is* to avoid off-topic comments, but this one was safe to leave up since it was an easily answered question that didn't risk derailing the thread and clearly wasn't trolling or attempting to irritate the OP. Basically, the removal was *not* incorrect as per the rules, but it was also a case where it wasn't *actually* a problem even though it *was* against the letter of the rules, so I reversed it. :)
